message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'd be happy to buy it for $100.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $140
